author: albert.feghaly
title: PanDAO: Focus on interoperability
description: There exists an urgent need for cross-chain governance standards, e.g. interacting with NFTs that live on decentralized storage systems.
solution: A Cardano-based governance system, with modular components for interacting with other chains and managing treasuries and decision-making.
experience:
Bioinformatics, Python, JS, Big Data, ML, AI, Blockchain.
Team = 5 + 3 Advisors -> https://intellart.ca/#/team
PhD-level, Post-doc-level.
